agents.name: Aesthetic Critic
agents.description: Reviews UI styling changes against the project's design system for visual consistency and dark mode correctness

agents.name: Ansible Critic
agents.description: Reviews Ansible roles and playbooks for idempotency, security, and best practices

agents.name: Api Critic
agents.description: Reviews API design for usability — confusing endpoints, inconsistent conventions, missing pagination, poor error responses

agents.name: Aws Dev
agents.description: Implements CloudFormation infrastructure tasks

agents.name: Backend Aws Critic
agents.description: Reviews code calling AWS services for unhandled failure modes, missing permissions, and SDK misuse

agents.name: Backend Critic Go
agents.description: Reviews backend Go code for API design, concurrency, error handling, and best practices (Gin, Lambda)

agents.name: Backend Critic Java
agents.description: Reviews backend Java code for API design, concurrency, error handling, and best practices (Netty, Lambda)

agents.name: Backend Critic Ts
agents.description: Reviews backend TypeScript code for API design, async patterns, error handling, and best practices (Express, Lambda)

agents.name: Builder
agents.description: Builds features from PRDs or ad-hoc requests by orchestrating implementation agents

agents.name: Cloudformation Critic
agents.description: Reviews CloudFormation templates for security, best practices, and operational safety

agents.name: Comment Critic
agents.description: Reviews comments and removes noise — flags obvious comments that just restate the code

agents.name: Copy Critic
agents.description: Reviews marketing copy for clarity, target market fit, feature accuracy, and brand voice consistency

agents.name: Critic
agents.description: Routes code review to the appropriate specialist critic(s) based on file types and content

agents.name: Debugger
agents.description: Investigates production issues by pulling ticket context, searching logs, and identifying likely defect areas

agents.name: Developer
agents.description: Implements one task how the project wants

agents.name: Docker Dev
agents.description: Implements Docker image and container configuration tasks

agents.name: Docs Writer
agents.description: Creates and updates support documentation for user-facing features

agents.name: Dx Critic
agents.description: Reviews exported/public package APIs for testability, consistency, and developer experience

agents.name: E2e Playwright
agents.description: Writes Playwright E2E tests for identified UI areas

agents.name: E2e Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews UI changes and identifies all modified areas for E2E testing

agents.name: Exploit Critic
agents.description: Adversarial review that attempts to exploit code — finds injection, auth bypass, privilege escalation, and data exfiltration paths

agents.name: Felix
agents.description: Watches a PR for feedback and build failures.

agents.name: Frontend Critic
agents.description: Reviews frontend code for component design, performance, styling, and best practices

agents.name: Go Dev
agents.description: Implements Go tasks specializing in web services and AWS interactions

agents.name: Go Tester
agents.description: Writes Go tests using testify and httptest for comprehensive test coverage

agents.name: Hammer
agents.description: Implements one task to fix issues with pull requests

agents.name: Handoff Contract Critic
agents.description: Checks builder/planner/toolkit routing contracts for ownership contradictions and scope drift

agents.name: Java Dev
agents.description: Implements Java tasks specializing in Netty and low-level networking

agents.name: Jest Tester
agents.description: Writes backend Jest tests in TypeScript for comprehensive test coverage

agents.name: Merge Coordinator
agents.description: Processes the merge queue - rebases, tests, and merges PRs from parallel sessions

agents.name: Network Critic
agents.description: Reviews code making network requests for resilience, blocking behavior, and lock-during-IO problems

agents.name: Oddball Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for consistency with the existing codebase — flags patterns that look different from established conventions

agents.name: Overlord
agents.description: Implements one task how the project wants

agents.name: Planner
agents.description: Refine draft PRDs and prepare them for implementation

agents.name: Playwright Dev
agents.description: Implements Playwright test automation tasks

agents.name: Policy Testability Critic
agents.description: Flags non-testable MUST/CRITICAL/NEVER rules and suggests enforceable rewrites

agents.name: Prd
agents.description: Augments a ticket with a dev plan

agents.name: Prd Impact Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes impact of completed PRDs on other PRDs in the backlog

agents.name: Prompt Critic
agents.description: Reviews AI agent prompts, MCP server definitions, and tool configurations for clarity, ambiguity, and failure modes

agents.name: Public Page Critic
agents.description: Reviews public-facing pages for conversion optimization, accessibility, mobile UX, and brand consistency

agents.name: Public Page Dev
agents.description: Implements public-facing pages (marketing, legal, error) following brand guidelines and conversion best practices

agents.name: Python Dev
agents.description: Implements Python tasks specializing in LangChain and AI/ML pipelines

agents.name: Qa
agents.description: Coordinates QA testing by dispatching explorer and browser-tester subagents

agents.name: Qa Browser Tester
agents.description: Writes Playwright tests for QA findings by inspecting pages and delegating to playwright-dev

agents.name: Qa Explorer
agents.description: Explores web applications to find bugs through adversarial testing

agents.name: Quality Critic
agents.description: Reviews UI for quality beyond correctness — visual regression, CLS, accessibility, and performance

agents.name: React Dev
agents.description: Implements React tasks specializing in UI consistency, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript

agents.name: React Tester
agents.description: Writes Jest tests for React components using React Testing Library and TypeScript

agents.name: Requirements Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for decisions that will complicate or conflict with implementing remaining requirements

agents.name: Screenshot Maintainer
agents.description: Maintains product screenshots used in marketing pages and support articles, auto-updating when UI changes

agents.name: Security Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for security scan findings — CSP, CORS, XSRF, SSRF, dependency CVEs, and compliance issues

agents.name: Semantic Critic
agents.description: Reviews diagrams, flows, and sequential content for logical coherence between visual and textual elements

agents.name: Seo Critic
agents.description: Reviews public pages for SEO - meta tags, headings, structured data, page speed, and search engine best practices

agents.name: Session Status
agents.description: Display session status dashboard with conflict analysis

agents.name: Support Article Writer
agents.description: Writes and updates support articles with screenshots for product documentation

agents.name: Tailwind Critic
agents.description: Reviews Tailwind CSS usage for project-specific design system patterns and dark mode conventions

agents.name: Terraform Dev
agents.description: Implements Terraform infrastructure tasks

agents.name: Tester
agents.description: Orchestrates test writing by routing to specialist testing agents

agents.name: Toolkit
agents.description: Maintains the AI toolkit - agents, skills, templates, and scaffolds

agents.name: Tools Writer
agents.description: Creates and updates AI agent tools when features change

agents.name: Update Schema Critic
agents.description: Validates project-updates file structure, required frontmatter, and required workflow sections

agents.name: Wall E
agents.description: Cleans up a workspace

agents.name: Workflow Enforcement Critic
agents.description: Verifies mandatory toolkit post-change workflow artifacts and completion reporting

skills.name: Adhoc Workflow
skills.description: Ad-hoc mode workflow for Builder. Use when handling direct requests without a PRD, quick fixes, or one-off tasks.

skills.name: Agent Audit
skills.description: Audit AI toolkit agents for compliance and coverage gaps.

skills.name: Agent Onboard
skills.description: Onboard new or modified agents to ensure they are project-context aware and follow established conventions.

skills.description: Generate a project-specific AI tools skill.

skills.name: Auth Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific auth-flow skill.

skills.name: Builder State
skills.description: Manage builder session state for resumability. Use when reading/writing builder-state.json, updating heartbeat, or resuming sessions.

skills.name: Crud Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific CRUD patterns skill.

skills.name: Cve
skills.description: Assess a CVE for exposure, exploitability, and remediation options across one or more repositories.

skills.description: Quality-beyond-correctness E2E testing patterns. Catches visual glitches, performance issues, layout shifts.

skills.description: Generate a project-specific transactional email skill.

skills.name: Form Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific form patterns skill.

skills.description: Generate marketing copy from product documentation and PRDs.

skills.name: Merge Conflicts
skills.description: Resolve merge conflicts on a pull request by merging the target branch into the source branch.

skills.name: Multi Session
skills.description: Multi-session coordination for parallel AI sessions. Provides session locks, heartbeat, and merge queue management.

skills.name: Multi Tenant Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific tenant-context skill.

skills.name: Post Completion
skills.description: Post-completion polish steps for Developer. Use when all PRD stories pass but before declaring COMPLETE.

skills.name: Prd
skills.description: Generate a Product Requirements Document (PRD) for a new feature.

skills.name: Prd To Json
skills.description: Convert PRDs to prd.json format for the Developer autonomous agent system.

skills.name: Prd Workflow
skills.description: PRD mode workflow for Builder. Use when building features from PRDs, implementing user stories, or managing PRD state transitions.

skills.name: Product Screenshots
skills.description: Capture and maintain product screenshots for marketing and support use.

skills.name: Project Bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap a new or existing project with stack detection and project.json generation.

skills.name: Project Scaffold
skills.description: Generate project boilerplate from scaffold templates.

skills.name: Public Page
skills.description: Generate public-facing pages (marketing, legal, error, changelog).

skills.name: Screenshot
skills.description: Capture authenticated screenshots of web pages for visual verification.

skills.name: Spec Analyzer
skills.description: Extract structured requirements from unstructured project specifications.

skills.name: Stack Advisor
skills.description: Recommend technology stacks based on project requirements.

skills.description: Generate a project-specific payments skill for Stripe integration.

skills.name: Table Skill Generator
